pages.text: $(li)The Molten Armor is a bit better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/griefer_armor)Griefer Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you wear a complete set, you will get the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/fire_resistance)Fire Resistance$(/l) II effect.$(br)$(li)This effect gives to you immunity to damage from fire, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blaze$(/l) fireballs, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charges$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_block)Magma Block$(/l) and lava.
